m_szDocTitle: Chinese president pledges cooperation on cyber issues
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Chinese president pledges cooperation on cyber issues GENE JOHNSON and PHUONG LE September 23, 2015 Pin it Send SEATTLE (AP) â€” Chinese President Xi Jinping said Tuesday that China and the United States could work together to address cyber crimes, a problem that has sparked mutual tension. Xi's statement came shortly after leaders from both countries signed an agreement to advance renewable energy and clean technologies to combat climate change.
